LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.label: Weaving area form
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.description: Builds an oriza and transforms itself into a static structure. In this form, Arachne Oribe is able to research the colony's more advanced technologies.
LanguageData.ARA_Ability_Morph.comps.CompAbilityEffec: Abilities must be placed on terrain
